resources.string: Potentiel de gaz à effet de serre (kgCO2eq) - Total :
Impact multicritères sur la durée de vie totale
Potentiel d’épuisement des ressources abiotiques (kgSbeq) - Total :
Évalue l’utilisation de minéraux et de matières premières fossiles.

The impacts related to manufacture are assessed using the methodology detailed by Boavizta in this article. Those related to the use phase are evaluated from the average power consumption or modeled from the estimated server load. The methodology is detailed here: doc.api.boavizta.org.
This page uses the BoaviztAPI. An open-source API that uses open data and methods to assess the environmental impacts of digital equipment.
